message: I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair starting point considering the inflation rates affecting us differently.
Considering the inflation, I lose more value each round. I think 55-45 is a fair split.
I understand your concern about inflation. Let's meet in the middle with a 58-42 split in my favor.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share due to the higher inflation rate affecting me.
